Uses of Package
com.powerup.logic

  • Packages that use com.powerup.logic 
    Package Description
    com.powerup.gui  
    com.powerup.listeners  
    com.powerup.logic  
  • Classes in com.powerup.logic used by com.powerup.gui 
    Class and Description
    Board
    The game's board, responsible for maintaining tiles.
    Company
    An electricity company.
    Game
    Sets up and provides access to the game's logic components.
    Player
    A player of the game.
    Tile
    A tile on the game board.
  • Classes in com.powerup.logic used by com.powerup.listeners 
    Class and Description
    Game
    Sets up and provides access to the game's logic components.
  • Classes in com.powerup.logic used by com.powerup.logic 
    Class and Description
    Board
    The game's board, responsible for maintaining tiles.
    Company
    An electricity company.
    DoE
    Subclass of player for the Department of Energy (passive player).
    Game
    Sets up and provides access to the game's logic components.
    Market
    The game's stock market, responsible for creating, modifying and accessing companies.
    Player
    A player of the game.
    Share
    A company share.
    Tile
    A tile on the game board.
    Tile.Location
    The three possible locations for a tile: BOARD - on the game's board; HAND - in a player's hand; NONE - unassigned.
    Turn
    A game turn; interacts with the GUI.
